Package _database

Class Database

java.lang.Object
_database.Database
public final class Database
extends java.lang.Object
Database is the class responsible for correct communication with the * database file. *

* The data is saved into an array of class stored in stream file. * Custom classes are provided to manage and store data as Clienti, Ristoranti and Giudizi. *

* In this class you can find helper functions to find, insert, update and delete data * from the database. Since this class is in common between clienti and ristoratori our * priority is to make a powerful yet simple helper class to achieve a single point of * junction between these two applications.

    • insertClient

      public static void insertClient​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String city, java.lang.String province, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String nickname, java.lang.String password)
      This function inserts a customer in the database.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the client
      surname - The surname of the client
      city - The city of the client
      province - The province of client
      email - The email of the client
      nickname - The unique nickname of the client
      password - The password of the client

    • insertRestaurant

      public static void insertRestaurant​(java.lang.String owner, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Long phoneNumber, java.lang.String qualifier, java.lang.String street, java.lang.Integer civicNumber, java.lang.String city, java.lang.String province, java.lang.Integer CAP, java.lang.String url, Restaurant.types type)
      This function inserts a restaurant in the database
      Parameters:
      owner - The name of the owner
      name - The name of the restaurant
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the restaurant
      qualifier - The qualifier of the restaurant (via or piazza)
      street - The street of the restaurant
      civicNumber - The civic number of the restuaurant
      city - The city of the restaurant
      province - The province of the restaurant
      CAP - The cap of the restaurant
      url - The url of the website of the restaurant
      type - The type of restaurant

    • insertJudgment

      public static void insertJudgment​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String restaurantName, java.lang.Integer rating, java.lang.String judgement) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      This function inserts a judgment in the database
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user who insert the judgement
      restaurantName - The restaurant name
      rating - The rating expressed as integer between 0 and 5
      judgement - The content of the judgement
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - This exception will be thrown if the file is empty
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - This exception will be thrown if the class is not found
